meta.title: System Installation - Block Style CMS
meta.description: Block Style CMS installation wizard. Configure your database, admin account, and external services.

complete.title: Installation Complete!
complete.description: Your Block Style CMS is now ready to use.

welcome.title: Welcome to Block Style CMS! üéâ
welcome.subtitle: Let's get your content management system up and running in just a few steps.
welcome.step2: Create admin account - Set up your first user
welcome.step4: Set up services (optional) - Connect external tools
welcome.step5: Complete installation - Start using your CMS

environment.title: Environment Check
environment.subtitle: Verifying your system configuration and permissions...

status.allPassed: All environment checks passed! Ready to continue.
status.someFailed: Some checks failed. Please fix the issues before continuing.

admin.title: Create Admin Account
admin.subtitle: Set up your administrator account to access the CMS management panel.

labels.name: Admin Name
labels.nameHelper: This name is for display purposes only, not for login.
labels.secretHelper: This secret is used for session encryption. Keep it safe!
labels.baseURLHelper: The root URL where your application server is hosted

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.secretInvalid: Secret must be a 64-character hex string

helpers.secretWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Save this secret securely. It cannot be recovered if lost.
helpers.baseURLWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This URL is used for building authentication links. Make sure it matches your deployment URL in production.

authentication.title: Authentication Methods
authentication.subtitle: Configure OAuth providers and admin access control.

adminEmails.label: Admin Email Whitelist
adminEmails.helper: Only these emails can access the admin panel (comma-separated)

validation.emailsRequired: At least one admin email is required

services.title: External Services (Optional)
services.subtitle: Enable optional services to enhance your CMS functionality. You can configure these later in settings.
services.tip: üí° Tip: You can skip this step and configure these services later in the admin settings panel.

validation.algoliaAdminApiKeyRequired: Algolia Admin API Key is required
validation.algoliaSearchApiKeyRequired: Algolia Search API Key is required

page.title: System Settings
page.description: Configure your website, authentication, and services

error.title: Configuration Not Found
error.description: Please complete the installation process first.

comment.title: Comment System Configuration
comment.description: Configure comment system settings and limitations
comment.maxTotalHelper: Maximum number of comments allowed in the system

suggestion.title: Suggestion System Configuration
suggestion.description: Configure suggestion system settings and limitations
suggestion.maxTotalHelper: Maximum number of suggestions allowed in the system

siteInfo.title: Website Information
siteInfo.subtitle: Configure basic website information and contact methods. These will be displayed on your website.

notice.title: Note:
notice.content: Website title, sub-title, and description are managed through internationalization (i18n) files in

logo.title: Website Logo
logo.requirements: PNG only. Recommended size: 512x512px. This logo will also be used as the website favicon.

contact.title: Contact Information (Optional)
contact.subtitle: Add contact methods for users to reach you. All fields are optional.

messages.uploadError: An error occurred while uploading the logo

channel.title: Channel Configuration
channel.subtitle: Configure navigation channels for your website. Tag-based channels filter articles, while page channels link to specific pages.

info.title: Tag Format:
info.content: Recommended format is _TAG_ (uppercase with underscores), but custom formats are also supported.

form.idHelper: Unique identifier (also used as i18n key)
form.iconHelper: Icon identifier (e.g., Home, Article, üè†, or custom)
form.tagErrorRequired: Tag is required for tag type

page.title: User Management
page.subtitle: Manage users and their authentication methods

deleteDialog.title: Delete User
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete user "{userName}"? This action cannot be undone.

step1.instruction: Step 1: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy)
step1.nextStep: Step 2: After scanning, click "Next" to enter the verification code

step2.instruction: Enter the 6-digit verification code from your authenticator app:
step2.label: Verification Code

step3.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Save these backup codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once and will help you regain access if you lose your authenticator device.
step3.title: Your Backup Codes:

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

confirm.disable2FA: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA for user "{userName}"?

mediaLibrary.title: Media Library
mediaLibrary.description: Manage images, videos, and other media files (Coming Soon)

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 - PRESENT Block Style CMS. All rights reserved.

meta.title: Create New Content Article ‚Äî AI-assisted ‚Ä¢ SEO Optimized ‚Ä¢ Block Editing
meta.description: Create new articles with AI-assisted writing, SEO optimization, visual Block content editing and multilingual support. Ideal for blogs, knowledge bases and content platforms for efficient authoring workflows.

delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this article? This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.title: Enter article title
placeholders.keyword: Type a keyword and press Enter or click Add
placeholders.tag: Type a tag and press Enter or click Add

helper.slugEditingDisabled: Slug cannot be changed in edit mode to keep the link stable
helper.slugUse: Will be used as the article's URL path
helper.noKeywords: No keywords yet ‚Äî add manually or generate with AI

publish.published: The article will be publicly available immediately
publish.draft: The article will be saved as a draft

messages.keywordsCommaNote: Convert Chinese commas to English commas

input.label: Image URL
input.placeholder: Enter image URL or click the button to choose

notes.supportedTypes: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, SVG

messages.uploadFailed: Upload failed: server returned an error
messages.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type. Please select JPEG, PNG, WebP or GIF.

states.welcomeHint: Enter keywords to search for high-quality free images

id.format: Article ID must be a valid UUID

keyword.min: Keyword must be at least {min} characters

title.min: Title must be at least {min} character

summary.min: Summary must be at least {min} characters

image.url: Cover image must be a valid URL

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search content, author, email or article title

delete.title: Confirm Delete Comment
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete Suggestion
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this suggestion? This action cannot be undone.

web.title: Block Style CMS
web.subtitle: Modular, Visual, AI-Driven Modern Content Management Platform
web.description: Block Style CMS is an open-source content management system built with Next.js, MUI, BlockNote, and Tailwind CSS. It features an intuitive modular Block editing experience, deep AI-assisted creation integration, multi-language support, and responsive design, empowering developers to quickly build high-performance, scalable content platforms.

channel.noArticles: No articles found in this channel

home.title: Latest Articles
home.emptyDescription: No articles available in the current language.
